content: {"locationId": "6580", "organizationId": "5594", "name": "Laurel Valley Area Food Pantry", "address1": "5414 Route 711", "address2": "", "city": "New Florence", "state": "PA", "zipCode": "15944", "country": null, "phone": "724-235-2028", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "40.3488464", "longitude": "-79.1254379", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Westmoreland", "languages": "", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "At West Fairfield Fire Hall.  The pantry is located on the left side behind the pavilion and parking lot.", "notes": "There are no indoor restrooms.  A portable restroom is located at the end of the pantry building on the left.", "contactName": "INGRID MURPHY", "contactPhone": "724-235-2028", "contactEmail": "igmurph@comcast.net", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Drive Through, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, Senior Food Box, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Canned fruits & vegetables and other household staple items, Eggs, Fresh milk, Various fresh produce items, Various meat items", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 47, "regionName": "Westmoreland Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "229d48bd-dcc1-4495-91d4-ca4ecdeb578f.png", "website": "https://westmorelandfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Monday 9:30 AM-11:00 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
